intro: Zuckia, commonly known as the common zuckia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its finely divided, fern-like leaves and small, clustered white or greenish flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, temperate environments and is often found in meadows and along stream banks. Zuckia is known for its aromatic properties and is sometimes used in traditional herbal remedies. Its seeds are edible and can be used in culinary applications.
